wikipedia_page.main: Thomas John "Jack" Miller (11 March 1875 – 1949) was an English footballer, who played for Wolverhampton Wanderers and Stoke.

response: * Jack Miller (1875–1944) an English footballer, with over 300 caps for Wolverhampton Wanderers and Stoke
